thumb.name: What's a Wonderful Boss?
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EOn Boss's Day.%3Cbr%3EKelly%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWhat Is a Wonderful Boss?%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESomeone who knows%3Cbr%3Ethe magic of teamwork.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESomeone who believes%3Cbr%3Ein dreaming%3Cbr%3Eas well as doing.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESomeone who looks for the good%3Cbr%3Ein others -- and finds it...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESomeone who takes the time%3Cbr%3Eto make everyone feel important.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESomeone who knows when to ask%3Cbr%3E'What's wrong?' and%3Cbr%3Ewhen to say what's right.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESomeone who is an everyday hero.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThanks for being the kind of boss%3Cbr%3Epeople can respect and admire --%3Cbr%3Eand for being the kind of person%3Cbr%3Ewho makes the workplace %3Cbr%3Ea nicer place to be.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Damn. We're Good!
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThey say%3Cbr%3Eyou can best judge%3Cbr%3Ea boss%3Cbr%3Eby looking at%3Cbr%3Ethe group%3Cbr%3Ethat works for him.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESo. what we're really%3Cbr%3Etrying to say is...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EDamn. we're good!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Boss's Day. Rick%3Cbr%3E
